Blog.post: Man, I swear I'm starting to forget what going to school feels like. Sick again today! This is just getting annoying now. One of my nostrils doesn't work, but at least the runny nose stopped. I'm coughing now though. This must be a new phase of the disease, because I wasn't coughing before. Well anyway, the other day I lied. "This Love" by Maroon 5 is good, but it's no longer the bestest song ever. This is it: Deep inside your soul there's a hole you don't wanna see Every single day what you say makes no sense to me Even though I try I can't get my head around you Somewhere in the night there's a light in front of me Heaven up above with a shove, I beg it's me Even though I try I fall in the river of you You've managed to bring me down too All you're faking (Get Up, Get Up, Get Up, Get Up) Shows you're aching (Get Up, Get Up, Get Up) Every single day what you say makes no sense to me Lettin' you inside, isn't right, don't mess with me I never really know what's really going on inside you I can't get my head around you All you're feeling (Get Up, Get Up, Get Up, Get Up) Shows you're breathing (Get Up, Get Up, Get Up) Deep inside your soul there's a hole you don't wanna see Covering it up like a cut with the likes of me You know I've really tried, I can't do anymore about you The cut's getting deeper (Yeaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahh) The hill's getting steeper (Yeaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahh) I guess I'll never know what's really going on inside you I can't get my head around you I can't get my head around you I can't get my head around you I can't get my head around you -"(Can't Get My) Head Around You," Offspring

Instant Messenger schizofrenia When you're sick, bored, and a loser, it starts to get to you, i.e. this conversation: ringotdl13: you're weird ringotdl13: you're weird ringotdl13: nuh-uh ringotdl13: nuh-uh ringotdl13: uh-huh ringotdl13: uh-huh ringotdl13: you suck ringotdl13: you suck ringotdl13: no you do ringotdl13: no you do ringotdl13: you ringotdl13: you ringotdl13: you! ringotdl13: you! ringotdl13: AHHH!!! ringotdl13: AHHH!!! ringotdl13: stop copying what I say! ringotdl13: stop copying what I say! ringotdl13: Oh my God if you talk again I swear! ringotdl13: Oh my God if you talk again I swear! ringotdl13: AH!!! ringotdl13: AH!!! ringotdl13: You shall burn in the Eternal Flame! ringotdl13: You shall burn in the Eternal Flame! ringotdl13: g2g ringotdl13: g2g ringotdl13: haha he left! ringotdl13: haha he left! ringotdl13: NO!!!!!!!!!!!! ringotdl13: NO!!!!!!!!!!!!

Man, this being sick thing is getting old. I'm sick again today and for some reason my ears feel all water-logged. You know when you're listening to your music on headphones and you try to tell someone something, and you don't realize that you're yelling because the music is so loud? It feels like that all day for me. But anyway, I was watching MTV and people, this is officially the bestest song ever: I was so high I did not recognize The fire burning in her eyes The chaos that controlled my mind Whispered goodbye and she got on a plane Never to return again But always in my heart This love has taken its toll on me She said Goodbye too many times before And her heart is breaking in front of me I have no choice cause I won't say goodbye anymore I tried my best to feed her appetite Keep her coming every night So hard to keep her satisfied Kept playing love like it was just a game Pretending to feel the same Then turn around and leave again This love has taken its toll on me She said Goodbye too many times before And her heart is breaking in front of me I have no choice cause I won't say goodbye anymore I'll fix these broken things Repair your broken wings And make sure everything's alright My pressure on your hips Sinking my fingertips Into every inch of you Cause I know that's what you want me to do -"This Love," Maroon 5

REMIX TO GONE FISHIN' (instead of ignition, get it? hehehe) THE REMIX TO GONE FISHIN', HERE WE DON'T GOT A KITCHEN, EVERYONE HERE IS WISHIN' THAT WE DID HAVE A KITCHEN. I JUST BOUGHT A KITTEN AND I NAMED HER MITTENS. I JUST BE SITTIN' HERE WHITTLIN', BUSTIN" RHYMES LIKE THEY VISIONS, I THINK YOU SHOULD LISTEN, BECAUSE I'M ON A MISSION. I HEAR THE FOOD SIZZLIN', THANK GOD WE GOT A KITCHEN WORD UP Y'ALL!

I'm sick. In more ways than one. I'm home sick today. I've got that coughey-sinusey-headachey-dizzy-sore-throughtey-slight-feverey-virus. Yeah, I'm feeling really phlegmy. I've used enough tissues already to absorb Crater Lake. But hey, on a lighter note, the Oscars were yesterday. Lord of the Rings finally got props for the Trilogy, which is good, because up until now the academy's been giving them the cold shoulder. I just saw the movie Matchstick Men on DVD. Oh my God that is the worst movie ever. It totally sabatoges itself with the ending. I get that he's a con man and in the end he gets conned, but did they have to con him so fricken hard? He's Obsessive Compulsive for heaven sakes! And the epilogue! That was was the worst thing I have ever seen. It says ONE YEAR LATER but the girl looks like she's friggen 19! If you've never seen the movie you can't realate to my anger, but if you have seen it then more than likely you feel the same way I do. I'm going to Panera Bread for lunch. They have good sandwiches there. And good soup. Maybe that'll make me feel better. I'm going to buy School of Rock on DVD tomorrow. I guess I'll watch it on the family DVD Player because mine's busted. I guess that's what happens when you buy a DVD Player from Winn Dixie. It was only 40 bucks though, how could I lose? This is probably my fourth Blog in the past year. I keep forgetting my user name's and password's. Maybe I should write it down somewhere...

Double-Swallowed Chicken and Random Questions Have you ever thrown up and then swallowed it back again? I did that today. It was chicken. How come when you swallow something it tastes good, (usually) but when you taste it again it tastes nasty? Have I been deprived if I've never eaten Fruity Pebbles? People Tell me they're good. Aren't Fruity Pebbles made of rice? Isn't vodka made of rice? Didn't the Russians make up vodka? If Chinese people eat rice everyday (most likely) then why didn't Chinese people make up Vodka? Do Russians even eat rice? Did you know that marshmallows are 80% air? It's like people are paying for air! We should sart an uprising for this cannot be tolerated! The marshmallow people should downsize their marshmallow prices by 80%. Well I'm getting bored and I'm running out of stupid, random things to say, so I'll just save you the pain of reading any further. See ya my peeps!

If you like pina coladas, getting caught in the rain, duh-nuh-nuh-nuh-nuh-nuh-nuh-nuh, duh-nuh-nuh-nuh-nuh-nuh Somebody spilled smoothie all down the aisle of the bus on the way back from Montgomery. It got all up on my shoe. The trip was somewhat fun, though. Me and Dillon must have gotten those trucks to honk their horns like 20 times. Did we ever find out who knocked down that picture in the Rosa Parks Museum? It wasn't me, that's all I know. Oh my God, that woman in the Judicial Building said keplar, but it's kevlar. She even spelled it out: K-E-P-L-A-R. Woo, some people are just...argh. The mall was fun. Did you know that they have Skittles in Limited Too? That guy in Hot Topic looked like Michael with a mowhawk, I swear. When we got back, and played outside it was fun. I rolled. I got dirty. I was having fun. Then, something happened. I got a Math study guide. Ouch.

No, I'm not dead. Sorry, I didn't have time to post for awhile. I went back to school though. Surprisingly some people were glad to see me. That was new. Maybe I should be sick more often... Anyway, school was boring. I wish Mr. Sipes, the Science teacher, would wear his Indiana warm-up suit again. Then we could laugh at him. Well, urlLink Mozilla Firefox is the best browser ever, is better than IE, and is faster too. Cool.

Bored... Woo, me bored. So just know that you reading this is a complete waste of time. Stop reading. Please stop reading? Come on stop reading...ARE YOU STILL READING? OH MY GOD STOP READING!!! AHHHHH!!! OK, everyone that's still reading gets $2.00 tomorrow. Yep, that's the kind of guy I am. $2.00. Really.

Wow. I have just witnessed the nastiest thing I've ever seen before. At A-Day there was this old lady sitting in front of me. All of a sudden she took off her shoes and started clipping her toenails. I swear, I almost threw up. She kept picking at, and caressing her old, wrinkly feet. She didn't stop the whole time. She just kept going and going-like the Energizer Bunny. Other than that though, it was a pretty good game. *Shiver* Bad Imagery...
urlLink This, my friends, is the definition of wicked-awesome.
urlLink KaZaA, you've finally met you're match

I'm going to A-day tomorrow. Isn't that something like D-Day? A-Day, A-Day, Wheeeeeeeeeeeee! Fun times man, fun times. That's gonna be the shiznit, y'all. No matter who you are, you know me. I'm that guy in the back of the room always going, "Huh?" Yeah you know me. I store candy in my trumpet case. Yeah you know me, I tripped and fell into the trash can. You know me, I'm the only guy in class who's ever forgotten to wear underwear. You know me.

I can't think of anything good to put in this little space... So we got report cards today...OH YEAH, I GOT ALL A'S, DUH-NUH-NUH-NUH-NUH-NUH. I need like my own theme song. I could just freestyle a tune while I walk maybe. OK, I've decided to fill out a list of things about me: How I would like to die : TIE: Suffocating in Jello, or Drowning in chocolate syrup. The best feeling in the world : TIE: When you get whipped cream on your face, or when you have to pee for a really long time, and then you finally do pee. I feel cool the most when : I'm sliding across the kitchen floor in my socks. Favorite Website : urlLink Tech TV Most Habitual Activity : TIE: Chewing a straw, or humming Favorite color : Gray Most Said Phrase : "Huh?" Music : Love it, thanks KaZaA. Isn't that illeagal? : Love it, thanks KaZaA. Aspirations : Sleeping, eating, dying.

What I, henceforth, hath done this day: 1. Started on Math Study Guide 2. Went and got tickets for A-Day 3. Had trumpet lesson 4. Finished study guide 5. Ate lunch at Mellow Mushroom 6. Laid low and avoided the Jahova's Witness people That's it. Kinda sad isn't it?

1. Shpants (Noun): a. Pants that usually extend beyond the knee, but no farther than the shin. b. Often considered as a mix between Shorts and pants I just love shpants. They are so awesome. They make me feel good and comfortable. urlLink Shpants.Net has many good examples of shpant-wearers and testimonials from people who love shpants as much as I do. The other day I was walking in my shpants and it hit me: Shpants are the most comfortable things ever. Yes, as I write this I am wearing shpants. I love them. I love them like a brother...wait, I already have a brother...
Update! It is now officially cool to switch all plurals ending with "s" to end with "z". As such this blog will conform to the new official coolness rule. Thank you. That is all.

Once I ate a raw fish... My Wish List (As of now): 1.) urlLink Xonix USB Memory Watch (Kinda James Bond-ish...) 2.) urlLink A Tactical Black Airzooka 3.) urlLink A fish 4.) urlLink Superpowers 5.) urlLink Money

One, Two, the Evil Bagel's comin' for you... The other day I had an Evil Bagel. I swear it was evil. My grandfather bought a 5-pack of 'em, but got sick after eating one, so he gave them to us. I thought, it couldn't be too bad...I was wrong. I ate that bagel and BOOM, I was sick all day. Not cool Mr. Evil Bagel, not cool at all.

Holy Crap, we really are rednecks. I saw this story and, being an Alabamian, just couldn't let it go: In a move that will surely improve the southern state's image, Alabama's Senate has named Conecuh Ridge Fine Alabama Whiskey the official state spirit. Conecuh Ridge Fine Alabama Whiskey traces its roots back to an illegal moonshine made in the woods near southeast Montgomery and now joins the largemouth bass, the pecan, and the yellowhammer in the pantheon known as State Symbols of Alabama. The resolution to make the whiskey the state spirit was vetoed twice by the governor and both times was overridden by the state Senate, thus making it official. A spokesperson for the governor's office was quoted as saying "The Legislature should have more important things to do," and went on to say that taking time to override the governor's veto made no sense given the economic problems that the state faces. State Sen. Pat Lindsey responded by saying "I thought the resolution was harmless and humorous." The governor vetoed the measure because he felt that official designations were meant for historic, natural, or native items and not for commercial products. This kind of thing really makes me want to hurt people. Have we really sunk this low, that we have glorified a descendent of an illegal drink originally created in the back woods of some drunk guy's shack? I guess we have. What's the use of fighting it. In the end it's gonna overwhelm us, and we won't be able to do anything about it. I'm very depressed now. Very depressed indeed.
Two Posts in One Day? That's like Christmas! Unless you're Jewish... Hey, I just made up a game using a remote control, a water bottle, and a toy turtle. God I'm lonely...

Ouch = Self-Enlightenment Today Megan accidentally slammed her locker door into my head. It hurt for the time being, it hurt. But, after awhile, I realized: It could have been much worse. I could have been hit in the crotch or knocked unconsious. I realize now that I should live life to the fullest, because any day I could be knocked into a coma, get a legged chopped off, or get shot in the stomach. I'll now try to be kinder to people. Give more than I'm already giving. Yep, that door slam has made me a better person. Yeah, it hurt like crap, but I thank Megan for it. Thank you Megan.

If gum was a drug, I'd be in rehab. By the way, the whole " z being cool" thing is now over. Well, for spring break, I went to Disneyworld, and the whole time I couldn't buy gum. Ouch. That hurts Disneyworld, that hurts. The rest of the trip was pretty cool, though. My feet hurted a lot during it, but that's okay...

A Profile So Corny it Makes Your Eyes Water. Nicole- I love you so much...you have been the greatest thing of my life...i love you more than anything and im going to spend the rest of my life with you..i love you so much baby! life wouldn't be life if you weren't in it...you make everything perfect baby cause you are perfect...i love you so much and im going to marry you and nothing is ever going to change that...i love you so much! you are my everything nicole and nothing is ever going to change that! there isn't a second of the day that goes by that i don't think of you...everything i do reminds me of you...i LOVE you life would be hell w/o you but now that you are here life is like heaven... Nicole i love you more than anything and nothing is ever going to change that! 01.04.04-always loving you OH MY GOD! Someone forgot their OCD medicine today. But seriously folks, this is some sad stuff right here. Just when you think you've seen everything and...BOOM! You see this. God, pull it together man. Get up off your knees for a second, and go get some grammatical help. I almost broke this computer doing a spell check on your profile. Ok man, you've got a run-on sentence bigger than my....well let's just say it's really big. You know in the end she's just going to dump you anyway. Let it go. Move on with your life. Take english lessons, get some pills, and move on.

Me and Kevin, we're weird. Shut up. k3vin12: lol anthonysaysno: hey kevin k3vin12: hey anthonysaysno: don't waste your time on me k3vin12: ok anthonysaysno: your already anthonysaysno: the voice inside anthonysaysno: my head k3vin12: lol anthonysaysno: well your the third one anthonysaysno: i have eight k3vin12: haha

Bored...A feeling I am now used to. The other day I stepped on a shard of glass. It was painful, but it didn't really start flaring up till now. I got a digital camera for my birthday though. That makes me feel a little better. I'm still bored though... I cant really walk all that much...yeah...But anyway, I should probably do something...that doesn't involve walking. I'm feeling a little melancholic. Betcha didn't know I knew that word. But still, I'm a little depressed...Maybe nothing is better than school...Or maybe not...

Ah...nostalgia... Since it's summer and everything I figured I'd change up the template. I remember the old one...but that's all behind me now. Now I have a better template and pictures, so it's all good. Yeah, I gotta keep telling myself that...

Back..........finally. I have been to the valley and now I'm back! Two weeks without Mr. Interweb doesn't sound too bad right? WRONG!!! C's on the report card was enough to send the parents into doling out computer restriction. Ouch. But now I'm back. I'm happy. I can now breathe. WEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!

Before today, i could never tell u who i just cant stand at certain moments. with normal ppl i could get mad at them for maybe 5 minutes, with shmitty it just seems to drag out! he is the only person i can truly say i love/hate. but at this moment i hate!! i hate him more than i hate hitler, ok maybe not that much but pretty bad! he's just upset cuz he's girl dumped him! so shmitty all i have to say is "burn in hell bastard!" felicia out.

Hey Everyone! Sorry i havent written in awhile but i just had to tell some1 bout today. so i was goin to the library gettin my usual Madeleine L'Engle book, this time i got "A Swiftly Tilting Planet" and its kinda weird how they just skip into the future but anywoo! i sat down to start readin when this HOTT!!!! guy sat down infront of me. i mean he looked like bowwow and usher put together! I think im in love! it's worse than how i feel with tarez, he was....FUNE!!Well im gonna be goin to the library everyday now to meet him again. i might go back today to get the 3rd harry potter book. Felicia out.

"BEEP!" *Person's name has been changed to ensure their safety. *Cindy: Oh hi. Nice to see- Me: Beep! Cindy: Okay, what have you been- Me: Beep! Cindy: Would you stop- Me: BEEP! Cindy: How was your- Me: BEEP! Cindy: Fine, I'm leaving if you don't- Me: BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BE - Cindy: ARGGH! *Runs off* And that is why I don't have any friends.

HAHA! I didn't brush my teeth today! It's true. I was in a hurry this morning and boo-yah! no one told me to so hey, that's almost like telling me not to, right? Yep. Got the Franz Ferdinand CD yesterday. It's really awesome. By the way, I went to AU Summer Band Camp last week. It was pretty cool. Me and Michael made a huge straw out of 30 inter-connected straws. I would've got a picture of it, but I didn't bring my camera,(Mom: "Don't bring it, it could get stolen")and the huge straw was hardly portable, so we just tore it apart and threw it away. Pity...

I'm ba-ack. Ok, so I went to band camp for like the last week. That's why i haven't been posting. I swear I'll start back again. Just not right now. Why? Because I don't wanna! I wanna be a dentist! Hmmph.

Know what annoys me? PEOPLE THAT CLAP WHEN THEY LAUGH! GOD! I was at the movie theater seeing The Terminal,which was good except for this lady in the front who kept clapping when she laughed. The half of the dialogue that I could hear over the earthshaking clapfest was good though. Sheesh. Shmitty out.

Good... That could be classified as an actual thought. Good job girl! Blogger changed the Post interface so the font and stuff might change, but oh well... I've just been at the lake for the weekend. I'm sunburnt and everything feels like it's floating, but overall, it was a cool experience. I burnt my little brother a CD to blow the Jackson 5 right out of him. It is as follows: 1.) Anthem of Our Dying Day - Story of the Year (He'd already heard this one and liked it so I put it in.) 2.) Memory - Sugarcult 3.) Our Time is Running Out - Muse 4.) Are You Gonna Be My Girl (Once again, one he heard and liked.) 5.) Lithium - Nirvana 6.) Somebody Told Me - The Killers 7.) Alive - Ima Robot 8.) Ch-Check It Out - Beastie Boys 9.) Walkie Talkie Man - Steriogram 10.) Walk Idiot Walk - The Hives 11.) Hate to Say I Told You So - The Hives 12.) Meant To Live - Switchfoot (Once again, one he had heard and liked. 13.) Ride - The Vines 14.) Stockholm Syndrome - Muse Hopefully, Now he won't go to meet Michael Jackson and get molested. Hopefully.
